application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: All in playground area:T1 - Damson (Prunus domestica 'inistitia') - reduce crown by 30% (1.5m) to suitable growth points - thin by 15% to allow more air/light through canopy - lift crown over pavement sideT2-Elder (Sambucus) and T3-Holly (Ilex): treat as 1x crown, reduce by 25% (1.3m) to suitable growth points - reduce side growth to match, shape, balance and tidyT4 - Cherry Plum (Prunus cerasifera) - reduce crown by 30% (1.5m) to suitable growth points - thin by 15% to allow more air/light through canopy - lift crown over pavement sideT5 - Elder (Sambucus) - reduce crown by 30% (1.5m) to suitable growth points - thin by 15% to allow more air/light through canopyT6 - Cherry (Prunus) - reduce crown to previous reduction points - remove any deadwood, carry out full aerial inspection and take any remedial action if required
